meanings.definition: A facial expression showing happiness or amusement.
meanings.sent1: Her smilet brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't help but return his warm smilet.
meanings.sent3: The baby's smilet was contagious, making everyone grin.
meanings.sent4: His smilet was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The memory of her smilet stayed with me long after she left.

meanings.definition: To express happiness or amusement with a smile.
meanings.sent1: She would often smilet at strangers passing by.
meanings.sent2: He smilet broadly when he heard the good news.
meanings.sent3: Even the grumpy cat smilet when offered treats.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden seem to smilet at the sun.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter made him smilet from ear to ear.

meanings.definition: A smiley face emoticon used in digital communication.
meanings.sent1: She sent a text with a smilet at the end.
meanings.sent2: I always add a smilet to my emails to seem friendly.
meanings.sent3: The smilet in the message made him chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His favorite emoji was the classic smilet.
meanings.sent5: The smilet on the screen made her day a little brighter.
